p: According to the ‘Prevention & Control Program for Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia (Trial) 6th Edition’ enacted by China's National Health Commission [ 8], close contacts are defined as those who did not use effective protection and had close contact with suspected or confirmed cases 2 days before the onset of symptoms. To date, accumulated evidence has indicated person-to-person transmission to be the cause of most infections [ 3, 9– 11]. Li had demonstrated that person-to-person transmission occurred among close contacts since the mid-December 2019 [ 10].
